website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer a more specific firmness level over the 2 loft options of the Classic Series MyPillow, the Premium Series is the hands down best option.
pros: Stands out for providing more features than other models made by the company – 4 loft levels that include least firm, medium, firm, and extra firm
cons: The Premium Series MyPillows are costlier than the Classic Series, but they also provide a wider range of loft options

customer_reviews.title: 37/10 would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow drunk, obviously, nobody spends 80 dollars on a pillow sober. Anyways it's awful it feels like a cotton bag filled with cotton balls and it's stiff af. Dude in the commercial was like my pillows the bees knees but it's not even the bees elbows. He's like look here gives perfect support nah man my neck is at like a 90 degree angle laying flat on it. I'm not a picky dude I was in the military and I've used rocks that were better pillows than this thing. I'm really not a picky person this pillow just sucks man straight up being honest
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE...I don’t think these are real.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same exact green pillow directly from My Pillow and it’s night and day (plus they have by one get one free) This pillow is extremely flat after the first night. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service from My Pillow
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice pillow, but it goes flat after a month of use. I have had it 2 years now and because they have a 10 year guarantee that it won't go flat, I am trying to replace it. I have called customer service, however, for the past 2 weeks and you have to leave a message. I have left 2 messages and have yet to have anyone call me back. It may take the full 10 years to get it replaced, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Worst head and neck pain of my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst pillow I have ever used. It has cut up pieces of foam inside so it is very lumpy and the foam parts like the Red Sea while I am sleeping. When I wake up all the foam is on the left and right with the worst head and neck pain of my life. It is also very hot. If you don't like having a hot pillow then this is not the pillow for you. All that foam just stores in the heat so one would want to flip the pillow over to get a cooler side. Well now you have to readjust all the pieces of foam to get comfortable again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have been to the top of the mountain and back regarding pillows. Memory foam, premium down, Japanese buckwheat hulls, and with only temporary relief at night with any one or a combination. The My Pillow has been a godsend. Yes it looks and feels like a middle school sewing project BUT, I no longer awaken with a headache or tingling hands. I can sleep either on my side or back and be totally comfortable and it doesn't make me hot.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: WORST pillow EVER!!! I can’t even believe I spent this amount of money on a pillow in the first place but I’ve been having neck problems with my current pillow so I bit the bullet. It is nothing like I expected at all. My pillow is halfway full of foam, the other half is empty. So I have to fold my pillow in half just to get all the foam in one place so my head does not rest to my mattress. Seriously the worst pillow ever... I’m writing this review in the middle of the night because my stupid pillow is disrupting my sleep... so annoyed right now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, Miserable, Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a miserable pillow. I find this the most uncomfortable pillow ever. I finally decided that maybe it had too much fill, so I ripped a seam and pulled out much of the foam and sewed the seam back up. Excited about the pillow that now fits my neck and head I laid my weary head down last night only to hear "keeeeeeeeeeeeeeee". The annoying sound didn't stop. I turned over and refreshed the sound again,"keeeeeeeeeeeeeeee". Is it possible that this will go on all night? "keeeeeeeeeeeeeeee" Yes. I threw this noisy monster from my bed and slept soundly the rest of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: If you like lumpy, half filled pillows, this is the pillow for you. Not sure how or why so many of these are sold. Worst pillow I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon selling fake pemium my pillow
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love the premium My Pillow. I have purchased 3 in the last 10 years as they do not last 10 years like the warranty states. This pillow that Is advertised it not a premium pillow, it is a classic pillow. It doesn’t have a gusset and comes in a bag that says my pillow classic. It has a barcode sticker that says my pillow premium but is obviously not a premium pillow which to me is pretty shady!
customer_reviews.author: brian mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Not my pillow unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I have been hearing for a couple years now how My Pillow is the next best thing to buying a whole new bed and people sleep like babies... unfortunately for me the pillow does not work with how I prefer to sleep. I sleep on my side and this thing was just too stiff to sleep comfortably with. Last night my first night with the new My Pillow and I slept 3 hours total... So as the headline reads, not my pillow. Gonna be a long day at work today. :(
customer_reviews.author: S. McClung

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Hmm I wanted to like these pillows. Their method of matching the size of the pillow to the person is convincing — but unfortunately they just didn’t cut it. The pillow completely flattened out in the middle when I put my head down and pushed all the stuffing to the sides. Seriously - I felt like Princess Leia with 2 giant buns on the side of my head as I attempted to sleep. My boyfriend tried the other one and he didn’t have much luck either. We both go from sleeping on our sides to our backs and these just weren’t supportive. I do understand that it’s supposed to adjust but it literally went flat. So alas, we returned.
customer_reviews.author: RobGP

customer_reviews.title: The Pillow is Almost as Annoying as the Commercial!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband hounded me to order this pillow from that super annoying commercial for months! Well, I finally did and guess who hates it. He really tried to like it, but after a week he had to give up. Very hard and very bumpy describes this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Gammy

customer_reviews.title: I don't like mine. You can feel the individual chopped material ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes his....I don't like mine. You can feel the individual chopped material inside. It breaks apart from each other when my head is on it. Not comfortable at all. Go to Bobs for a gel pillow....they're incredibly comfortable and snug around your head.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: What is all the fuss about over this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been having difficulty finding a pillow with the right loft and support that doesn't give me instant tension headaches. Well this MyPillow was a huge disappointment after reading some positive review. I selected the green/firm fill as that is waht is recommended for my size. When the pillow arrived rolled up, I thought no worries, it will lay out and gain its shape. The fill was very inconsistent and hard. I could never get this to sleep good that some report. Oh well at least it has a return policy.
customer_reviews.author: JFG

customer_reviews.title: All hype, no quality
customer_reviews.text: After listening to the advertisement that talked about the sleep numbers from the Sleep Society, etc., I decided to give My Pillow a try. It was good the first night. After that, it would not stay plump. I kept fluffing it up but it would go flat immediately. The foam rubber inside is lumpy, and the pieces pressed into my face while sleeping. It was not comfortable at all. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carrozza

customer_reviews.title: my pillow blue fill
customer_reviews.text: i am 6ft 270lbs with wide shoulders..i have tried many bamboo pillows,temperpedic,and casper..this pillow seems to do the trick.i have the blue series and love it the pillow has chunks of foam that are made to expand as soon as you put it in the dryer when you first get pillow for 15 minutes this allows you to shape the Pillow pretty much to your head and how you like to lay..it might sound weird having big chunks of foam but you get used to it and every 3 months just wash and dry
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: ... have neck issues and have yet to find a great pillow, so consider that in my response
customer_reviews.text: I do have neck issues and have yet to find a great pillow, so consider that in my response, but what I most didn't like about My Pillow was that the pieces of foam are too large for my likes, and made it seem like I was sleeping on rocks, albeit soft ones, of course. Several of my less-princess-and-the-pea-type friends really love theirs, but I really did not. (maybe 2 1/2 stars would be better)
customer_reviews.author: BGBacaSF

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is not.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my wife and one for myself.Good for about a year and then it goes south.You can wash and dry per instructions but this pillow just doesn't hold up.It's now weirdly lumpy and gives both of us neckaches and restless nights.The ten year warranty is a crock.They will replace the pillow if it's flat!!! What? So I can send it back again?Beware,the warranty is for sixty days.It might work for you?!?! Not for us.Google this company.Bad juju.Aloha.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer L.

customer_reviews.title: Have had Classic 6 years, Premium version is flat.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Classic pillow 6 years, last week received Premium pillow, size white in fill. This pillow is only 3" longer and filled Half as much as my Classic, fluffed it in dryer every day, still flat and empty spots when I lay on it. I'm only 5'1". So this is appropriate size for me. But the fill is inadequate for the size of the casing. I'm returning it and sticking with my awesome 6 year old Classic My Pillow. Disappointed though. Needed an extra one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G😊MTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Have to try yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what to think. Slightly smallish and the medium " white "seemed understuffed and soft and a bit flat. You can get a better quality down pillow at Macys on sale. But it has clump like things that seem to stabilize your head in the position its in which is interesting. One of those things you have to try yourself. And it is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis L. Stavn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold shape with the way I sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Pillows came as advertised. I ordered one each of the green(medium) and white (firm) king premium series. I followed directions and fluffed them in the dryer. They came out as advertised. They do not come as advertised when it comes to sleeping on them. I sleep with my hand under the pillow, thus, my hand pushes up against my head. The pillow doesn't hold it's shape because of the pressure between the hand and head. And it is the same between both medium and firm. I'm still within the warranty and haven't decided yet whether to return or keep.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the PILLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this pillow by my massage therapist so as always I went to find it on Amazon and there it was! I was a bit leary about it when it came out of the package as it was so light weight and it seemed like there was nothing to it for the price of $60. When I slept on it that night I was so wonderfully surprised as to it keeping it's shape when sleeping on my back or side. I have fibromyligia and sleeping is so important to me and I know if you don't get the "pillow" right or the "mattress" right you are in trouble....I love this pillow and would highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Burich

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product quality.  Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard/queen "green" premium MyPillow that I purchased a few years ago. Love it. Take it with me when I travel. Wanted to purchase a second one ("MyPillow" was the seller on Amazon), so ordered the same model & firmness. New pillow has MAYBE 2/3 of the fill of the one I purchased before, and it all bunches to the sides. Center of the pillow has no support whatsoever, making it useless. Reading other reviews, this seems to be a common problem. This company seems to have major quality control problems. Returning this pillow, and will not be purchasing any more products from MyPillow.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: Honest Opinion
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both purchased one of these pillows. They received good reviews and the marketing campaign was huge. But they are the worst pillows we have ever had. The filling appears to be the foam cushion from an old sofa or something, shedded up, and stuffed into a very thin, see through, covering. You will need to purchase pillow dust covers for these or they will tear apart. We both sleep on our side/stomach and purchased the ones recommended, but it is way too thick to be used for anyone but a back sleeper as it has no give. To be honest, I would not recommend these for anybody but maybe a back sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy and Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great great great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected.Ive been using it now for almost two months. Pain in neck gone already but i dont know if it works for waist..I will habe to check that out...It is a miracle .Whatever technology is involved,is astonishing..I have lived with neck pain for years .now its gone after use few times.Just Ordered for my wife UPDATE on July 2nd 2017 My wife and I are fully satisfied with this product. It is worth the money paid.I will recommend it to anyone with neck pain associated with sleeping position
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Give it a chance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my grandma because she kept asking me about it. I went by the chart and bought the white level. When it arrived we put it in the dryer as directed. She was concerned because it didnt seem firm enough and take in mind she doesn't care for firm pillows. After a few nights she decided to keep the pillow because she said she sleeps a lot better. The pillow isn't something that will wow you after the first night. However give it a few nights and you'll wonder how you ever lived without one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first, then nothing
customer_reviews.text: The MyPillow massive ad campaign where you could hardly watch a channel without seeing this guy presenting himself as the most honest guy ever who personally invented the best pillow ever worked, and we bought several. They’re fine for awhile, but after a few washes, I started waking up unsupported with the pillow squashed and bunched up against the bed head, which is just what this pillow is NOT supposed to do. Yes, this guy is very shrewd with a massive ad campaign, and I’m sure he’s extremely rich now, so congrats to him, but I’d say it’s better to avoid being sucked into his massive MyPillow ad wave.
customer_reviews.author: WWF

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this pillow 3 stars for one main reason. Although the pillow has the potential to be a very comfortable pillow, it's seriously lacking in fullness. I followed the instructions and placed pillow in the dryer. In fact, I dried it again for even longer after sleeping on it for one night. There's just not enough stuffing. Add more stuffing and it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Young

customer_reviews.title: Premium does not fit the same as Standard.
customer_reviews.text: My Pillow is a great pillow for sleep. This was my second one. My only reason for a decreased rating is the Premium Series is not the same as the Standard Series (my first purchase). In the standard series, the green size fit me perfectly and I got a great night sleep, but, in the premium, not the same. When I stopped by the My Pillow store, they said this is not uncommon, and many people need to buy one size up in premium. Also, be aware, this supplier offers a 30 day return, vs the 60 day trial promoted nationally by My Pillow. So, check your fit and sleep quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Austin 52

customer_reviews.title: one the chart recommended and one size firmer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different sizes, one the chart recommended and one size firmer. With both they do not support my head and I wake up with all of the stuffing pushed out from underneath my head.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's Just a Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Its a pillow--no better or worse than other pillows I have used. The advertising on TV on this product is definitely "over the top" and very misleading. I turn and move during the night so the pillow needs to be re-adjusted (re-fluffed) so as to be comfortable in a different position. I don't think people really sleep in one position all night long. Save your money is what I suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Dain M.

customer_reviews.title: my husband loves his, mine is alright
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to buying 2 of these for my husband and I. I can completely understand why some people don't love how it is lumpy, but it's the lumpy factor that makes it kinda nice actually. It allows you to get yourself in literally any position you want with your pillow. My husband absolutely loves his! I on the otherhand am not wild about it but i think it's just personal preference based on how i sleep. I'd call it a good pillow, he'd call it heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Boehmer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I gave them a try for over 1 month. No more of My Pillow Inc. products here. I will donate the pillows to a donation center. I hope this review helps people before they conceder buying My Pillow Inc products. Need to know more? please fill free to ask me. The best pillow out there for me is the Sleep Number pillow the AirFit® Pillow(Contour). Yes, it is expensive but you get what you pay for. And once again, I hope this review helps people before they conceder buying My Pillow Inc products. As I like to say, Caveat emptor is Latin for "Let the buyer beware"
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Way too firm
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and this is far too firm. I went by the recomended chart to determine which one I should order. I'm overwieght which I didn't understand why that would matter when selecting a pillow. Heed my warning. This could have been a very nice pillow had it had half the filling.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: I got the level recommended for me with the least amount of filling (can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the level recommended for me with the least amount of filling (can't remember the color...white?) but it was horrible. I laid on it and all the filling went to both sides as my head hit the bed... literally only two pieces of fabric between my head and the head. Zero support!! Returned!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky and disappointing! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for 50 bucks to see what all the hype is about. Let me just say that I'm a Airbnb Super host with over 10 homes so I've been through about every pillow out there. This pillow is worth $10 if that! Seriously. I bought some Bellagio pillows at Sam's club months ago for 2for$20 and they are FAR superior to this gimmicky product. Your basically paying for the barrage of advertising you see everywhere and that's it. Quality speaks for itself and these just don't have it. $50 is an INSANE price for a pillow anyway, should have you dreaming of unicorns and such but no. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Glenny Spriggy Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pillow! Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest pillow that I have ever laid my head on! So, so comfortable and I sleep so soundly! I have had neck surgery and laying down on this pillow at night relives the pain where my others didn’t! My wife has said that my snoring has gotten less and less! Another reason I love it is because it is made in the good old USA! Buying American products is a big factor now in my life! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby52855

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions on pillow package before you submit a review. Best pillows ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought 2 more pillows and bought the king firm premium and they are fantastic. All I can say to those who say they are flat n not filled, I honestly had to laugh at the video reviews! READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!!!! You have to PUT THEM IN THE DRYER on high heat for 15 to 20 minutes after you remove them from the package. Lol. They go from flat and no fill to PLUMP FULL FLUFFY pillows. I've had my firm queen pillows for 5 years and a wash n dry on high heat makes them feel like new again. I highly recommend these pillows. Best I've ever bought. The firm are not hard n still, just more filling.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype!
customer_reviews.text: After several months of bad sleep, my 10-year-old pillow needed replaced. I searched endlessly trying to find the best option. I had heard about the hype surrounding my pillow and thought I’d give it a try. When I first arrived I thought it was going to be way too flat, but read the instructions and put it in the dryer like it said too. That helped a little but it goes flat instantly once you lay down. It is incredibly lumpy and all of the pieces inside the pillow separate so you constantly have to reform it while you try to sleep. I would pass on it while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, sturdy, easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This pillow comes in a tiny box and is flat as a pancake. It needs a good two or three days to fully air out and let the smell get out. After that, fluff away. It washes very well! I put a tennis ball in the dryer with mine. Much better than the travel size version!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collects at end
customer_reviews.text: I've given these two pillows (soft and medium) 90 days. The medium was definitely too overstuffed. The soft was better. Starting off, the pillow was very comfortable, but as the night wore on, the insides collected at one end, I had to keep adjusting the insides of the pillow to be comfortable. I should have watched the 60 day return deadline, as I would have returned it. Now, after 90 days, I'll donate it to charity and hope that someone will appreciate it more than I do. I'm heading to Bath, Bath and Beyond now to purchase a premium down pillow for the same price (that I should have done in the first place).
customer_reviews.author: TikiFin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!! Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is an absolute joke and complete waste of money. I bought this with hopes it would relieve my neck pain after trying many other pillows. I read positive reviews before buying but this pillow didn’t do anything for me. It’s flat like a $9 pillow you can buy from any chain store. So disappointed. I was forced to give one star btw.
customer_reviews.author: CLE shopper 2016

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, average pillow
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing special about this pillow. It was under stuffed too. Not worth the money. I ended up.buying a pillow at Target that was overstuffed for under $10 that worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: no pillow for my head
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the product I received is defective or if the quality of this product is dropping. I am contacting the seller and asking to return it. I have slept on several of these at various locations and finally decided to buy one for myself. Even my husband loves his...tried it and it was to fluffy....that is why I went with less loft. But this thing is flat and does not fluff up at all ever. In fact it is so lumpy it is like sleeping on something that has been torn up and put into an oversized bag.
customer_reviews.author: melody toppins

customer_reviews.title: these are the best pillows I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost a year after listening to the hype to order the set of pillows I wish I had ordered it right away I have never slept better in my life and I would toss and turn all night long. I'm going to send the set to both of my sons for the birthday present they are that good
customer_reviews.author: Melz

customer_reviews.title: Med Fill Is My Favorite Less Fill Firm Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pillows, 1 med fill and 1 less fill firm. What’s going on with the firm ? None of the reviews appear to be positive. I really expected the less firm fill to be firm but not too firm. Instead the less fill firm has a lot less filling than the med fill one I bought. Its almost like they didn’t fill the case with enough filling. There actually more case than filling. It’s going to be my secondary pillow. I put the med fill on top of the less fill firm and it works perfect for me. The med fill is my favorite. Just the right firmness for me.
customer_reviews.author: C Carstens

customer_reviews.title: Not good pillows
customer_reviews.text: I have my pillows for years and need new ones. I order two pillows, one came it wasn’t sewn up in one part and the stuffing was coming out in the bag it was in. These are completely waste of money. The other pillow is uncomfortable not like the ones I bought years ago. If I could give no stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: lost sleep every night i used it
customer_reviews.text: my mom bought this for me...watching the pillow huckster use god, pestilence, & the presidents podium to enrich himself. i'm appalled my mom fell for this smarmy pillow propaganda. To be nice to my mom i tried the pillow out. all i could think of was drumpf, lifting an honest buck out of my mom to build yet another self emulating monstrosity. the pillow is as greasy as the white house squattor. amazon send me my refund.
customer_reviews.author: joshman

customer_reviews.title: If you prefer colder pillow on face, this might not be the right product for you.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know I needed to have a clothes dryer to run the pillows through 15 min. I did my best to fluf with heat and some strong flffing by hand. My dryer will arrive in 60 days since I am now in SE Asia. I realize the dryer issue has affected how they are suppose to be. Being a Fox News watcher and seeing interview of Mike Lindell, the owner of My Pillow, I trust him and his claims. only thing I dislike, compared to foam pillows is that they are warm to my face in shorter amount of time. Thus need to turn pillow over etc in tropical weather here.
customer_reviews.author: Mstar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My boyfriend has this same pillow, which he purchased directly from the company. Fell in love with his pillow! I ordered this one and was SOOOO excited to get the pillow and have a great night sleep! The pillow I got was so terrible. Not firm, offered no support. It was emptier and less firm than an old worn down flattened pillow. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Great! Go Soft
customer_reviews.text: I had been in search of the perfect pillow for many years. So many fails. My guest bedrooms are filled with expensive pillows because of they were either too firm or too soft. I first bought the "yellow," it was too firm. The "white" is perfect. I bought this "white" one for my honey's son telling him if he didn't like it to put it in the guest room so I didn't have to tote mine with me when I traveled. Yeah, he kept it. A seriously great pillow at a "medium range" price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: PREMIMUN PILLOW
customer_reviews.text: JUST ORDERED THE PREIMUM BLUE PILOLOW. REPLACED THE 5 YEAR OLD PREMIMUM PILLOW FROM 2012. WOW, HOW HAVE THE PRODUCTS CHANGED. MY OLD PILLOW IS STILL FIRM. THE NEW PREIMUM PILLOW IS SO LESS LOFTTY. WE ALL KNOW TO DRY THE NEW PILLOW IN THE DRYER 15 MIN. I KNEW I WOULD NEVER HAVE ANOTHER GREAT PILLOW LIKE I BOUGHT IN 2012. ITS SAD, ONCE YOU MAKE IT YOU CAN LOWER YOUR STANDARDS. I LOVED THIS PRODUCT WHEN IT WAS NEW. ILL MISS MY 5 YEAR OLD GREAT PILLOW. ITS IN MY DOGS BED NOW. THE NEW PILLOW IS ALSO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: !!!!Do Not Order until---
customer_reviews.text: This pillow seems to be great, however;!!!! Do Not Order one until you go to there website and understand the meaning of the fill levels listed!!! I am 6'3" and weigh about 210. I unknowingly order a white label pillow, while really comfortable I it is not enough fill for me. Works great when I get it scrunched up. I will order another one with the right fill. Just think the description could be more like the one on the website, wether purchasing here or anywhere
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW:  Wonderful Pillow/Worth Every Cent!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I was skeptical of purchasing such a costly pillow. After sleeping with MY PILLOW ot os worry every penny. Best nights sleep I have had in years with comfort and support. I highly recommend this great pillow. Be sure you fluff the pillow up in a drier prior to use. Placing pillow in the drier seems to make it come alive and then it has the support you’ll appreciate. I normal would seek a medium firm but in MY PILLOW I am using the FIRM (green) which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Seyeret

customer_reviews.title: American made value
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! Slept like a log and it appears it will not flatten as other pillows do after a weeks use. We followed the instructions to fluff in dryer for 15 minutes and it really made a positive difference in the pillows appearance and performance. I was a former quality manager at a pillow factory , stitch count, thread count, fabric hand and fill quality are all there.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan
customer_reviews.text: I like the premium because it has a gusseted sidewall for easier fill manipulation.....Although my second pillow was the classic and it’s pretty similar in the way it feels. I am a stomach and side sleeper and I still like the extra firm because I like my head on and angle and this pillow holds it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dswish

customer_reviews.title: Not the Miracle Pillow for Me - Extra Firm is not Firm Enough & it Does Not Sleep Cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm a side sleeper and need a firm pillow. Instead of following the guide to order the firmness suggested based upon a person's size, I went ahead and ordered the Extra Firm. All the little pieces inside the pillow seem to shift and create a little well, instead of providing the firm support needed. Also, some reviews seem to suggest that the "air circulation" created by the little pieces in the pillow helps for those that tend to sleep "hot". I don't find that it helps at all. Overall rating: Meh... not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: myukipyuki

customer_reviews.title: ZZZZZZ...wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying this, but then I've spent almost as much for a down pillow, so thought I would take the chance. There is a great article in "The Week" about this product. It arrived all rolled up, with instructions to place it in the dryer for 20 minutes before using it. Well, my husband loves it, and is sleeping more soundly and comfortable with it. This pillow is actually washable, in fact they recommend that you launder it every four months or so.
customer_reviews.author: aikane

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst pillow I’ve owned! It bunches up (see pics) and I have to flip the pillow around several times a night- EVERY NIGHT! In addition, I thought this pillow was supposed to help with neck and back pain but it has made mine much worse. So disappointing and aggravating. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped get rid of neck pain and headaches
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is great, and is absolutely the best pillow I’ve owned. Used to wake up every day with neck pain and a stiff upper back, but even after 1 night with this pillow properly supporting my head and neck that was almost gone. I think it’s essential to properly select the fill level based on the criteria they have on their website to get the right pillow. I couldn’t be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the worst pillow I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst pillow I’ve ever owned. After 4 years I finally figured out that most of my sleep issues were caused by this pillow. Because the stuffing compounds so hard under your skull it pushes your head down closing your airway and essentially priming you for sleep apnea. Don’t let your grandma be fooled into buying this pillow for you. The pillow is so awful I feel like I don’t even need to mention that the owner of the company is a total nut bag. Whoops. I switched to a cooling memory foam pillow with a neck contour and have been able to finally get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great pillows!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these pillows to me as she has neck problems and thought they would help me as well. I have arthritis in my neck and almost always woke up in pain and with a headache. These pillows are amazing! My neck no longer hurts in the morning and I pretty much stay pain free all day. It usually takes me a few nights to get used to new pillows but I loved these right from the start. (I've had them about 3 weeks). If you have problems with your neck do your body a favor and try these!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Better than a feather pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Okay 2 years ago I bought 2 feather pillows for half the price of one of these... I couldn't justify the price. But the feather pillow case is wearing out and they do flatten where your head sits... So after 3 days of Mypillow? I gotta say the Mypillow beats a feather pillow, which I considered the best type of pillow. I still think it's overpriced, but dang I do like the way it provides just the right amount of support and adjustability. You wont be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PILLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow; my husband not so much! If you like soft squishy pillows that you can shape and reshape to however you like it, this pillow is the one for you! To puff it up, a few minutes in the dryer is all it takes! Love it! My husband likes a firmer pillow, but just recently mentioned to me that he "might" want one for our other home. That says a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Lindengrass

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: this is the cheapest non supportive , poor quality, took 30 min in dryer to fluff it up then it felt like a bunch of cut up old mattress . this cut up foam rubber does not sleep good now I got to look at this on TV every 5 min. don't buy these products
customer_reviews.author: oscar kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the support that it claims
customer_reviews.text: I have watching this ad for this pillow for a very long time so I decided to purchase one, after using it for 3 days I don't feel it has the support that it claims to have, 230 lb and it feels like I have nothing under my head
customer_reviews.author: Hemi57

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because I liked the feel of a friend's My Pillow, so I bought this, and man am I glad I did. Unlike other pillows I've bought in the past, I'm actually noticing a change in sleep quality and length. I simply sleep better with this pillow, hands down. Sure, you may think it feels super comfy, which is important, but to have it effect sleep quality is amazing. It's a bit expensive, but it's definitely worth it in my mind. Glad I bought this, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hope Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. This is my 3rd order of this type of pillow over the past 5 years, 2 king size and 1 standard. I have cervical problems, neck and shoulder. I also have sinus allergies. I can't have anything too hard or too soft or my neck begins to ache. I spent $200 on a pillow that I can't really use (memory foam) that I purchased from a specialty mattress store. However MyPillow cost way less and is way more comfortable because it is made to conform to your body. I appreciate the fact that this pillow can be washed frequently, maintains its shape and comfort over a long period in addition to being being hygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy and it hurts to sleep on it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is terrible! I followed all of the instructions exactly and this is the lumpiest most uncomfortable pillow I have ever slept on! It actually hurt my neck really badly to the point I had to schedule a chiropractor visit! I do not recommend this pillow to anyone! You expect a cheap pillow from Walmart to be lumpy and hurt you, but not a pillow as expensive as this one! It's false advertising and a complete rip off! Do not buy this pillow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You may as well just sleep with no pillow.
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this pillow a few months now. I followed the instructions that came with it (which I don't think I've ever had to do with another pillow lol) and honestly I just hate it. It's concept is there, but it feels... Under filled maybe? Basically I find myself waking often to re-distribute all of the little popcorn fluff inside the pillow because it all moved out of the way. I tried it with a tighter style (center open) pillowcase, and I've tried it with a size smaller pillowcase, but it didn't help enough. End of the day... probably a solid concept that is more marketing company than pillow company.
customer_reviews.author: David Cardarelli

customer_reviews.title: Worst pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst pillow ever. I can't imagine what all the fuss is about. The ad campaign is everywhere all the time so maybe that's it. I did buy it so the ads work. Don't let them work on n you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: A bit too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and sleep on my side, so I look for a pillow with some size and support. This one was actually a bit too much for me. I have purchased a number of MyPillows in various fill or loft levels and I am very happy with them. I do recommend MyPillows, but for me the Firm fill is sufficient, the extra firm fill was a bit too firm. The MyPillows need to be washed and dried before use to get their fill in the correct state, otherwise they are very lumpy. The extra fill completely filled the pillow case, soaked up A LOT of water and took extra effort to get dry.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ordinary pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I got an extra firm king size pillow. Halfway through the night I noticed that the filling was no longer under my head but had shifted to around my head! Leaving me flat. As if there was not enough stuffing it "interlock" to keep it in place. I expected a firm pillow, even some weight to it. In fact it is very light and fluffy. It may be a nicer pillow than some, but far from extraordinary andI don't think it is worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: djhack

customer_reviews.title: If you buy one, buy firm.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow, but I ordered the medium fill and wish I’d ordered the firm filled.... I may sew the end and make pillow smaller to make it more firm..... I don’t like that due to less fullest in pillow casing that the stuffing separates cause my head to not have the support I like.... seems my head slips off the pillow. I’ve never done this with other pillows and I do wake up with ‘bedhead’... messes my hair up...which my other pillow didn’t. I’d like to know how the firmer pillow sleeps but not enough to pay that much money to find out. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst pillows
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows for my whole family. And there is only one who doesn't have problem with it. I have a bad neck , shoulders and would wake up with a headache every day.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much one of the worse pillows I've ever owned - sorta feels as promised when you first get it, but the promises of how amazing it is are way exaggerated. The instructions strongly encourage you to wash and dry it on normal settings and that this will make the pillow like new again. All it does it make the pillow lumpy and weird. You can feel it's just filled with little memory foam balls and it's just a freakin weird pillow. And WAY overpriced - just don't buy it. Nothing replaces a high end, expensive real down pillow or a highly rated contour pillow. Typical "As Seen On Tv" product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the pillow for 3 days but so far I love it! I especially liked the 10 year warranty as I typically need to replace a pillow about every 6 months. We'll see how well I like it in 10 years but I do have 2 friends who've had mypillows for a few years and are still in love :)
customer_reviews.author: Dog Daft

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy this product again!
customer_reviews.text: Quality was disappointing! I didn't even sleep on it...I read the contents label...it was shredded foam rubber! NOT what I thought was inside MY PILLOW! FLIMSY covering!! OVERALL UNACCEPTABLE...I think it is a knockoff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Malone

customer_reviews.title: Best. Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Best.Pillow.Ever. I was skeptical at first because the texture seems chunky and weird. I was wrong. That chunky foam forms perfectly to your head filling the gap bed the bed and your neck when you sleep on your side. I no longer wake up with a stiff neck or shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: schjdh

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Am pleased with this purchase. A co-worker recommended these to me when I told her I was having a hard time finding a flatter pillow. I ordered one level down based on my weight. So, I think I got the yellow. I like that you can move the filler around so that based on what way you’re sleeping, you can customize your support so to speak. I would definitely recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid1221

customer_reviews.title: Not enough filling- quality control bad
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a firm premium pillow but the one I got must be a defect because there is hardly enough filling inside the pillow the filling actually separates completely and moves to each side of the pillow and leaves the center completely flat . I have to grab the pillow and shake the heck out of it to get the filling back to the middle . Not sure I would buy another one
customer_reviews.author: M. Grunewald

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the worst product we’ve purchased from Amazon. My husband bought 2 of these to surprise me. And surprised we were. These MyPillows do not fluff, do not have filling and do not support your head. In fact, if you like sleeping with your head on the bed, and 2 mountains of foam on either side- this is the pillow for you. I can not believe Amazon is selling junk like this. Seriously. We sent them back the very next day and we won’t make that mistake again. I don’t leave reviews often, but I felt like I needed to leave a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeena Thompson

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I used a my pillow at my in-laws and it was great. I've tried 3 of the various levels of fill on new ones but they don't have the loft of the older one I used at my in-laws. I've tried moving the fill to the middle by squeezing the ends together but it doesn't hold thru the night. A big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pillows!! You can scrunch them up in every way possible and with a gentle shake they go right back to their original shape. The only reason I only gave them four stars is because I get very warm at night and they really don't keep my head any cooler than a regular pillow as advertised. But I can live with that, the comfort is well worth it. Now I'll just have to wait and see if they hold up to the ten year guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: merely okay and WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought the classic pillow in medium, and it was not at all what I thought it would be. So, I thought I would try the premium pillow. Both types are WAY overpriced.This green label supposedly 'firm' premium pillow is a bit fluffier and has a bit more filling, but all in all, it is still not as good as I had hoped. This is supposed to stay in place, and not go flat, but it doesn't stay locked in place, because I wake up often just to 'fluff' it back up. I think I will add some of the filling from the classic pillow to this one and see if I can make my own perfect comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Mystical

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: My Pillow brand is overpriced, and in my opinion overrated. I am certain that the abundance of TV ads is the reason. It's a nice pillow and machine washable... just like the $4, $5, $6 and $7 pillows I recently purchased at Walmart. Yes, they too are machine washable! Just like other pillows, occasionally you do need to punch or puff up the pillow when it gets too flat in the center. I do admit it does wash and dry well, and I am very happy that it is made in the USA! Keep THOSE Products coming.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: Their green level pillow - firm for side sleepers - isn't very firm
customer_reviews.text: Their idea of firm is a lot less than most other firm pillows I own. I opened it and ran it through the dryer like they specified. It's very soft. It is their green level pillow which is supposed to be good for side sleepers. After the dryer drill, I played with it for about 20 minutes moving foam around and finally folding it in half. Ni Jiy and I do not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow does not have enough stuffing in it, very disappointed. After seeing the commercials on television and the radio commercials I expected this to be the best pillow ever. I have even tried washing and drying it to see if it would fluff up more but I think because there is not enough filling there is only so much fluff there could be. I had to fold this pillow in half to get any kind of decent support for my head. I have already went back to my old pillow in order not to have a neck ache every morning after using My Pillow. I really wanted to love it but it did not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Shestark

customer_reviews.title: Too much hype
customer_reviews.text: Too much hype and not enough results. Pillows are stuffed with shredded foam and you have to keep adjusting the pillow each time you move. I bought a memory foam pillow from Relax the Back years ago and went back to it. MyPillow is the same as hundreds in retail stores. I wish I had read the reviews before I made my purchase. One hype is that MyPillow is cooler......forget that. My husband said with the shredded foam on both sides of his head and face he was hot and felt like he was suffocating. I would have sent it back but my granddaughter kept it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stadterman

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality pillow
customer_reviews.text: i guess if you are able to make good TV commercials and look like a trust worth likable guy, you can sell anything. As is clearly the case with this pillow. Simply put this is just not a good pillow, it doesnt hold my head at all, and its not better than a 10 pillow at BBB.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Total scam. Don’t buy. Extremely uncomfortable. Awful. Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I was sleeping just fine to be honest. Thought my pillow would be even better. WRONG. Absolutely awful pillow. Couldn’t even lay on it for a minute before it started hurting my neck and back. Was so horrible I literally threw it off the bed because it hurt my neck so much. Also gets really hot too (even with 100% cotton sheets). This pillow is absolute garbage. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: MY PILLOW!!
customer_reviews.text: My Pillow is so wonderful!!! It's soft but,it is firm at the same time. My head and neck area rests at a perfect angle. And ...I seem to fall asleep quicker, and I sleep more soundly!! I have tried so many different types of pillows..My Pillow is a real keeper. I
customer_reviews.author: evahn c. taylor

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive over rated pillow. All the things they claim about it is not true. I have an $8.00 pillow here that I have had for 2 years that is just as good as this. I do not get a better nights sleep. I do not get up feeling more rested. It does not hold its shape. It goes flat during the night and I have to fluff it up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to advertisements
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in the pillows but shied away because I was concerned it would end up being a "TV PRODUCT" disappointment. When I saw the pillows on Amazon I decided to try them. I knew Amazon's policies would provide an easy return if not satisfied. Happy to say the pillows have lived up to their advertisements! Extremely comfortable, don't get hot, no more tossing and turning, I am impressed and very satisfied! My husband who has rheumatoid arthritis is also extremely satisfied and sleeps more comfortably. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom D

customer_reviews.title: Ad for this pillow is promise that it will never ...
customer_reviews.text: Ad for this pillow is promise that it will never go flat. I have had it for 1 month & every night, all night, I am constantly dealing with it going flat. The fill poofs up all around my head so I spend much of the night squeezing the pillow back into shape or flipping it over so that the side the fill is now on is under my head. I have finally given up & gone back to my old pillow. Hoping to return it since it's been less than 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly firm for how light it is
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. Pay attention to the instructions to throw it in the dryer to fluff it up. I've only had it for 3 month but it is as firm as the first time I used it. As advertised, it cradles my head and neck and remains exactly the same firmness as I turn and roll throughout the night. I bought the firm, expecting it to lose loft over time. It hasn't packed down at all, so I'm ordering a medium loft to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Hell no
customer_reviews.text: Okay this is the worst pillow I have ever had in my life. Worse then the hammy down pillows I had as a child. It is full of lumps like the filling is a bunch of cotton balls and where ever you put your head it literally flattens out. There is zero support. I got king size which when you shake to shape it before bed literally shrinks down to queen size. I promise this is the worst pillow ever. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bloam

customer_reviews.title: This did not meet the product reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have been waking with stiff neck and shoulders for many months, and was thrilled to read of the almost instant relief "my pillow offered". I read many raving reviews and decided to try one. I did not notice the difference and still woke with the stiffness and soreness. I do not feel that it was worth the money. I am going to let my husband use it and see if it works for him. I will not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hans

customer_reviews.title: Its not as comfortable as they claim it is
customer_reviews.text: I have given it a try and I am not impressed. The commercial said it doesn't go flat which it does. Its not as comfortable as they claim it is. I sleep on my left side and still wake up with a sore neck. At night I have to keep fluffing it up which is irritating. I will not recommend this to anyone. They charge way too much for freaking pillow thats no better than the rest of them.
customer_reviews.author: i Grimm reis is  Asien  this  in german ok

customer_reviews.title: best pillow ive every slept on
customer_reviews.text: best pillow ive every slept on! i've tried many pillow and all were not the one for me. i have head and neck problems so i need a pillow that supports but is not to firm that it puts pressure on neck or head. this pillow is perfect i was able to select the exact firmness for me, which as less firm the yellow filling size. i highly recommend this pillow to everyone, especially if u have neck and head problems. thanks my pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Dee W.

product_meta.title: MyPillow Premium Series [Std/Queen, Medium Fill] Available in 4 Loft Levels
feature_bullets: Made with patented interlocking fill, Gives you the exact support you need as an individual
Made 100% in the USA - Manufactured in our home state of Minnesota!
MyPillow Promotions not offered on Amazon

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars7,475 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: MyPillow® Pillows and other products have a 10-year limited warranty on any workmanship and/or material defects. We warranty MyPillows not to go flat during the 10-year warranty period, regardless of how many times the pillow is washed & dried. MyPillow will replace the defective MyPillow with a pillow of equal or greater value. MyPillow will cover all shipping charges.
